backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko canister with an empty actor.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping product features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of key frontend components, screens, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining light/dark theme variables and base styles with OKLCH color tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React app managing routing between screens with auth and result guards, and wrapping providers.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Simple layout wrapper centering content with a max width of 500px.
frontend/src/components/PhotoInput.tsx: Photo input component allowing file upload or camera capture with preview, retake, and removal handling.
frontend/src/components/TopBar.tsx: Top navigation bar providing branding, language selector, theme toggle, and optional logout control.
Implements a local authentication context storing users and sessions in localStorage, providing login, signup, and logout helpers.
frontend/src/features/generation/generat: Defines interfaces for caricature generation input and result objects.
frontend/src/features/generation/useCari: Provides a hook to simulate caricature generation, store results in localStorage, and manage generation state.
frontend/src/features/i18n/i18n.ts: Contains language types and translation dictionaries for multilingual UI text.
frontend/src/features/i18n/useI18n.tsx: Provides an i18n context with language persistence and a translate helper.
frontend/src/features/payment/razorpayPl: Stub for Razorpay payments that warns when no key is configured and returns a placeholder object.
frontend/src/features/payment/useMockPay: Implements a mock payment hook simulating processing and marking payment status in localStorage.
frontend/src/features/pricing/useRegiona: Fetches the user's region to select a price from a predefined map and caches it locally.
frontend/src/features/theme/useTheme.tsx: Provides a theme context allowing light/dark mode toggling with persistence in localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context, providing login, logout, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets global Tailwind styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes, including smooth UI transitions.
frontend/src/lib/downloadPng.ts: Handles downloading images, converting SVGs to PNG via canvas when needed.
frontend/src/lib/storage.ts: Provides typed helpers for getting, setting, and removing JSON data in localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/uiStyles.ts: Exports shared Tailwind CSS class strings for cards, buttons, inputs, and labels.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and renders App.
frontend/src/screens/AuthScreen.tsx: Implements login and signup forms with validation, local auth handling, and UI tabs.
Collects a user photo, handles mock payment, and triggers caricature generation.
frontend/src/screens/LandingScreen.tsx: Displays the landing page with examples, hero image, and a start button.
frontend/src/screens/ResultScreen.tsx: Shows the generated caricature, allows downloading, viewing the source photo, and starting over.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, radii, animations, plugins, and content paths.
